name: Pixel Rivals | Upcoming Online Multiplayer Game!
name_original: Pixel Rivals | Upcoming Online Multiplayer Game!
description:
Pixel Rivals! The upcoming online and local multiplayer couch game!  A game which you, your friends and your family, and even your rivals! - can build a connection and laugh together in an exciting world.   We present you. A beautiful pixel game in 3D with appealing characters and more!  In Pixel Rivals, we plan to make it as fun and as entertaining as possible! 2 maps, 4 characters  and even more in the future! We put a lot of effort and times together with in our busy lives. We hope that more people play and enjoy our game in the future! Local play: You can plug in 1-4 controllers to play!

L1 to Block melee attacks

L2 to dash

R1 to melee/push

R2 to use skills

Aim with the right stick and may the highest points win!

This is a very early version of the game! Online version is coming soon!

Known bugs that we will fix very soon :

-Error message "EditorSphere" shows when you start the game.

-The game has a tendency to crash due to an early UE5.1 problem/bug.

When you encounter the crash, please let us know if you have an idea to when and why the crash is happening if possible.
